Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rose water \Rose" wa`ter\ Water tinctured with roses by distillation. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Rose-water \Rose"-wa`ter\, a. Having the odor of rose water; hence, affectedly nice or delicate; sentimental. ``Rose-water philanthropy.'' --Carlyle. [1913 Webster]
rose water n : perfume consisting of water scented with oil of roses
